title: In our words: stories from Victorian veterans [May 2009]

abstract: 11 stories from Victorian war veterans from World War II
description: Eleven Victorian war veterans tell about their experiences as part of ACMI's Digital Storytelling workshop. They tell of their personal recollections of war being declared, signing up and their service during the war as well as remembering those who fought and the symbolism of the Shrine of Remembrance.
